summary: The Chinese company in charge of handing out domain names ending in “. top” has been given until mid-August 2024 to show that it has put in place systems for managing phishing reports and suspending abusive domains, or else forfeit its license to sell domains.  The warning comes amid the release of new findings that...
title: Phish-Friendly Domain Registry “.top” Put on Notice

summary:
I’m re-watching the gripping show Dopesick. 
One of the stories is about a couple of parents who are having a hard time accepting that their daughter is gay.  When she goes to the doctor for advice on the situation, he replies:

Forgive them...
title: Sometimes you gotta let it go
